Indian Economy.title: India’s gig economy in 2025: Growth, formalisation, and financial inclusion explained

Indian Economy.title: Potato price crash threatens ₹10,000 cr sector, says Bengal cold storage association
Indian Economy.summary: Farmers are now suffering losses of ₹400-500 per quintal, particularly in districts like Burdwan, Bankura, Medinipur, and parts of North Bengal, where prices have dipped sharply at cold storage gates

Indian Economy.title: India’s crumbling public infrastructure is a crisis of accountability as much as quality
Indian Economy.summary: Recurring incidents of catastrophic collapses of public infrastructure have cast an unwelcome spotlight on the country’s ability to build quality infrastructure at scale and with speed.

Banking & Finance.title: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on Saturday, 26 July? Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Banks are generally closed on the second and fourth Saturdays of every month. However, they are open on the first, third and fifth Saturdays, according to the RBI calendar on bank holidays.

Technology Sector.summary: India-UK FTA addresses potential impact of UK's carbon tax on Indian exports, allowing India to take counterbalance measures.

Technology Sector.title: A R Rahman, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman join forces for AI project 'Secret Mountain'
